conclusion: Understanding the configuration and forces acting on the wire frame.
Wire frame is semi-circular with radius r, fixed in a uniform magnetic field, connected to a DC power supply, with Ampere force F on straight part.
Total length of wire frame is L = πr + 2r.
Current I in the wire is I = F/(2Br) using F = BIL for straight part.
Force on semicircular part is F_semicircle = πF/2.
Total force on wire frame is F_total = (1 + π/2)F.
Magnitude of Ampere force on entire wire frame is (1 + π/2)F.
